title: BonziBlog
description: A Blog for those who see Bonzi as  a bit of a legend

post.title: Maybe one day Bonzi will evolve
Incoming Bonzi Memes! P.S Thanks to all the Peers for letting me share my love of Bonzi :)
Don't get on Bonzi's bad side
I can't wake up! (Wake me up)
New BonziBuddy Attempt Episode 2 Coming Soon!
post.body:
I'm downloading an image of windows 7 with ie8 for maximum vulnerability to Bonzi, hopefully this will be an old enough OS for Bonzi to latch onto, unfortunately Windows does not host their WinXP virtual images anymore, its sad really, because Windows Destruction Videos, and Bonzi, only really feel right on Win XP. Its okay though, ill change the desktop background to bliss, that way Bonzi will be confused and feel at home >:)

![windows-XP-defaul-broken-security-flaw.jpg (1200x750)](data/img/post_6_windows-XP-defaul-broken-security-flaw.jpg)​​​​​​​

post.title: Oh Bonzi, so close but so far away...
Thanks to the second ever peer of the Blog, you made the Blog possible, I can't host websites on my own for some reason
BonziBuddy Attempt 1(Unsuccessful)(ReactOS)
post.body:
I tried to install Bonzi on ReactOS (An Open-Source remake of windows from the ground up) Needless to say, ReactOS is not as stable as our pal Bonzi, and I will probably need a real WindowsXP installation to get him running, either way, heres the youtube video in WebM:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U5q1FNpkmZk

post.title: Bonzi in his resting state, awaiting your next TTS input
Zeronet Blog for all fans of Good Ol' Bonz
post.body: Specific links for Bonzi won't be hosted here, so as to not spread entertaining malware to those who can't control it. But If you love Bonzi as much as we do, ZeroMail us at mightyfedorus with your tutorials and content relating to Bonzi and if we like it, we'll upload it! For now this site is just going to be filled with pictures, memes and links to videos showing Bonzi in action.
